titleStmt.title: The notorious imposter, or, The history of the life of William Morrell alias Bower, &c.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Settle by Wing, DNB and others.
Ed. of 1694 has author's name and title: The compleat memoirs of the life of that notorious imposter Will. Morrell ...
